name: Visitacion Valley Greenway
description: Provide environmental education and opportunities for children and residents to garden
fullDescription: Provide environmental education and opportunities for children and residents to garden
whatTheyOffer: The Visitacion Valley Greenway Project was created to provide: Education of local school children, youth and the community about natural sciences, nutrition, and horticulture, environmental issues and advocacy. Open space for recreational activities. Pedestrian pathways linking the neighborhood. Greening, beautification and revitalization of the entire neighborhood. All of which have led to a sense of community and empowerment among the community's culturally diverse residents and given opportun
email: Fran Martin: fran@visvalleygreenway.org  Jim Growden: jim@visvalleygreenway.org   Anne Seeman: anne@visvalleygreenway.org
